name: ACL Assistive Technology State Grants for Protection and Advocacy
objective: To support protection and advocacy services through the systems established to provide protection and advocacy services under the Developmental Disabilities Assistance and Bill of Rights Act for the purpose of assisting in the acquisition, utilization, or maintenance of assistive technology or assistive technology services for individuals with disabilities.
top_agency_name: Department of Health and Human Services
beneficiary_types: Physically Afflicted (e.g. TB, Arthritis, Heart Disease)
applicant_types: State (includes District of Columbia, public institutions of higher education and hospitals)

authorizations.text: Section 5 of the Assistive Technology Act of 1998, as amended.

rules_regulations: Contact the Program Office for this information.
